original_text: Is it not wheat harvest to day? I will call unto the Lord, and he shall send thunder and rain; that ye may perceive and see that your wickedness is great, which ye have done in the sight of the Lord, in asking you a king.
korean_text: 오늘은 밀 베는 때가 아니냐 내가 여호와께 아뢰리니 여호와께서 우레와 비를 보내사 너희가 왕을 구한 일 곧 여호와의 목전에서 범한 죄악이 큼을 너희에게 밝히 알게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: Is it not wheat harvest to day?
I will call unto the Lord
and he shall send thunder and rain
that ye may perceive and see
which ye have done in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 여호와 보는 앞에서 행한 악이
